name: Reverse 1999: The Theft of the Rimet Cup
storyline:
Today's news headline is:
"The host of the jewelry show offered another reward of £1 million for the best thief who can filch the 'The Heart of London'. Several famous thieves have failed and been arrested ..."
summary:
Version 1.1 of Reverse: 1999, which includes:
• New characters: Melania, Pickles, and Diggers
• New Garments for Regulus, Centurion, and APPLe
• New main event: The Theft of the Rimet Cup
• …and more!

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Version 1.1 Trailer - "The Theft of The Rimet Cup" | Reverse: 1999
